channel.title: VideoJS on Memo Tut
channel.description: Recent content in VideoJS on Memo Tut

item.title: [Python] Deliver private content with AWS CloudFront
item.description: This article is a continuation of [Video Streams with AWS S3 + CloudFront](http://qiita.com/terapyon/items/b77ac981da790662e247"VideoStreamswithAWSS3+CloudFront"). Purpose Connect with a time-limited URL. (One-time URL) I want to restrict the viewing to the video stream and distribute it. (This time I tried with images) Finally, I want to distribute the video using Plone authentication. (Challenge after next time) S3 and CloudFront settings Create a new bucket and put a trial image. Try distributing this image privately.
